text: Va qavmi Muso pas az [raftani] u [ʙa kuhi Tur] az zevarhojason mucassamai gusolaero soxtand [va parastidand], ki sadoe [hamcun sadoi gusola] dost. Ojo namedidand, ki [on pajkari ʙecon] ʙo onon suxan namegujad va ʙa rohe hidojatason namekunad? Onro [ʙa parastis] giriftand va [ʙa xotiri in sirk nisʙat ʙa xes] sitamgor ʙudand
